overview: Keadaan Kahar is a Stand-Up Comedy Special Number 8 where Pandji discusses all of his concerns regarding the COVID-19 Pandemic. The event which was held at the end of last year is also a kaleidoscope closing in 2020. Keadaan Kahar or Force Majeur is the right title because it describes the conditions experienced by all of us during a pandemic.
title: Keadaan Kahar
